Name: Tricia Taitt, New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation.
Title: Resolution designating Tricia Taitt, a resident Queens, for appointment by the Mayor as a director of the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Section 4 of the New York City Health and Hospitals Act (Chapter 1016 of the Laws of 1969), the Council approves the designation of Tricia Taitt, a resident Queens, for appointment by the Mayor to serve as a director of the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation for the remainder of a five-year term that will expire on March 20, 2025.
